comments.raw_text:
(In reply to Serge Gautherie (:sgautherie) from comment #0)
> While checking bug 625115,
> I wonder whether we should port (some) updates from Firefox.

Have to be careful since we don't have any search agreements so can't follow Firefox blindly and use the Firefox affiliate codes (if any).
